text: Futhi ukube besiyenzile iQur’an ngolimi lakwelinye izwe ngempela babezokuthi, “ kungani ingachazwanga imininingwane yamavesi ayo? Kungani hhayi ngesi-Arabhu kanye nom’Arabhu?” ithi yona eyalabo abakholwayo, umholi kanye nomelaphi futhi labo abangakholwa ezindlebeni zabo kunobuthuli futhi bona (ubuthuli) kuwubumpumputhe kubona, labo-ke babizwa endaweni ekude
